alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued April 06 at 11:11PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 5AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall WHERE...All of American Samoa WHEN...Through 5AM IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Satellite imagery show convective clouds heading over the territory bringing rainfall, heavy at times, and gusty winds especially during time of heavy rainfall. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1110 PO ASO LULU APERILA 6 2022 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 5AM... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Amerika Samoa atoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 5AM AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O loo faaalia mai luga o ata satelite ni faaputuga ao e mafua mai ai timuga, e mamafa i si taimi, ma e agi faatautau ai savili i taimi o timuga mamafa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
